snippet: Intricately carved Tibetan religious book covers are featured in a new book and at Asia Week.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; intricately carved Tibetan religious book covers are featured in a new book and at Asia Week; collection of 3,000 travel stickers amassed by Gaston-Louis Vuitton survive at the company archives; Ashmolean Museum of Art and Archaeology at the University of Oxford in England has an exhibition of bird paintings from British naturalist Mary Impey’s collection; Workt by Hand, show featuring  generations of quilts, opens at the Brooklyn Museum.
lead_paragraph: Intricately carved Tibetan religious book covers are featured in a new book and at Asia Week.

headline.seo: Tibetan Manuscripts, Vintage Luggage Stickers and Quilts
headline.main: Tibetan Manuscripts, Vintage Luggage Stickers and Quilts
